descriptionHtml:
[b][i][size=5]Improved Meeko[/size][/i][/b]

[i][size=3]Simple mod that aims to make Meeko a useful companion. No scripts.
[/size][/i]
[font=Arial][size=3][i][b]SSE version [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/8165]here[/url].[/b][/i][/size][/font]


[u][b][size=4]Changes[/size][/b][/u]

- Set to essential
- Boosted health (100 -> 190) and stamina (65 -> 145), just like the hireable vanilla Dawnguard huskies Bran and Sceolang.
- Level cap: 81
- Won't affect stealth
- Perks: Stealth Rank 5, Light Foot and Silence
- Sneak skill went from 72 to 100
- Behavior: Unagressive (won't attack unless the player does or when attacked).


[u][b][size=4]Versions[/size][/b][/u]

The changes mentioned above are applied to all versions. [b]Choose only one![/b]

[list]
[*][i]Better Meeko[/i]: kept as a common dog.
[*][i]Better Meeko - Unarmored husky[/i]: turns him into an unarmored Dawnguard husky.
[*][i]Better Meeko - Armored husky[/i]: turns him into an armored Dawnguard husky.
[/list]

[b][u][size=4]Instructions[/size][/u][/b]

Drop the .esp into your "\Skyrim Special Edition\Data" folder. To remove, deactivate the mod and then delete the .esp.


[u][b][size=4]FAQ[/size][/b][/u]

[i][b]Q:[/b] Meeko keeps dying.[/i]
[i][b]A:[/b][/i] You probably met him before installing the mod. Open the console, click and type: [font=Courier New]setessential 000D95E9 1[/font]

[i][b]Q:[/b] I can't dismiss him.[/i]
[i][b]A:[/b][/i] Open the console and type:[font=Courier New] set playeranimalcount to 0[/font]

[i][b]Q:[/b][/i] [i]Meeko didn't get the improved stats.[/i]
[i][b]A:[/b][/i] The stats will be recalculated once you level up (open the skills menu).


[u][b][size=4]Recommended mods[/size][/b][/u]

[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58895/]Better Dogs - Silence[/url][/b] - saves your sanity by shutting up the incessant barking.



[size=4][i][b]* Feel free to edit, redistribute or do whatever you want. No permission or credits needed. *[/b][/i][/size]
author: sfang
